Text:
For sure the greatest Heavy Metal singer of all times. I saw Heaven & Hell at Sweden Rock Festival 2009 and I'm truly grateful for that.

Thanks for all your fantastic music. R.I.P.

"The world is full of Kings and Queens. To blind your eyes and steel your dreams"
Thanks for the upload, but FYI "Last in Line" is missing tracks 7-9, and the album titled "Evilution" is actually "Strange Highways."
